mapper.sql: id, service_flag,service_ip_address, service_name, service_password, service_link_id, service_data_type, middle_port, middle_httpport, middle_tcpport, service_status, service_message,service_dz_port, service_time, service_sub_type, service_sub_id, file_service_type, keep_type
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_server_param_config where (service_ip_address,service_sub_type) in (select service_ip_address,service_sub_type from (select service_ip_address,service_sub_type from tbl_server_param_config tmp where id = #{id}) as tmp) or id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_server_param_config (id, service_flag,service_ip_address, service_name, service_password, service_link_id, service_data_type, service_status, service_message, service_dz_port,service_time ) values (#{id}, #{service_flag}, #{serviceIpAddress}, #{serviceName}, #{servicePassword}, #{serviceLinkId}, #{serviceDataType}, #{serviceStatus}, #{message}, #{dzPort}, #{serviceTime} )

insert into videoinsightCollecter.tbl_server_param_config
id,
service_flag,
service_ip_address,
service_name,
service_password,
service_link_id,
service_data_type,
service_status,
service_message,
service_dz_port,
service_time,
service_sub_type,
service_sub_id,
file_service_type,
middle_port,
middle_httpport,
middle_tcpport,
keep_type,
show_flag,

mapper.update:
update tbl_server_param_config
service_ip_address = #{serviceIpAddress},
service_name = #{serviceName},
service_password = #{servicePassword},
service_link_id = #{serviceLinkId},
service_data_type = #{serviceDataType},
service_status = #{serviceStatus},
service_message = #{message},
service_dz_port = #{dzPort},
service_time = #{serviceTime},
keep_type = #{keepType},
where id = #{id}

update tbl_server_param_config set service_ip_address = #{serviceIpAddress}, service_name = #{serviceName}, service_password = #{servicePassword}, service_link_id = #{serviceLinkId}, service_data_type = #{serviceDataType}, service_status = #{serviceStatus}, service_message = #{message}, service_dz_port = #{dzPort}, service_time = #{serviceTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_server_param_config
ORDER BY id desc
limit ${(pageNum-1)*rowsPerPage},${rowsPerPage}
SELECT CONCAT(dzServer.service_ip_address,':') AS IpAndPort FROM tbl_server_param_config dzServer WHERE service_flag = 2 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
select count(distinct service_sub_type) from tbl_server_param_config where service_flag = 2 and service_ip_address = #{serviceIpAddress}
mapper.update: update tbl_server_param_config set service_ip_address = #{serviceIpAddress} where (service_ip_address,service_sub_type) in (select service_ip_address,service_sub_type from (select service_ip_address,service_sub_type from tbl_server_param_config tmp where id = #{id}) as tmp)
mapper.select:
select distinct (service_sub_id),service_sub_type,remark from tbl_server_param_config where
service_sub_type = #{serviceSubType}
